features: High Quality Parts: Bidet attachment is constructed with durable ABS material, portable control panel, high-pressure faucet quality valves with metal/ceramic core, brass T-adapter, braided steel cold water hose instead of traditional plastics

Dual Spray Nozzles: Bidet attachment features dual nozzles for two spray modes: front cleaning for women's private, rear cleaning for men & women. Samodra upgrades knob switch to button design for easier to switch between patterns

Highly Sanitary Protection: Self-cleaning feature cleaning the nozzles thoroughly, telescopic nozzles automatically retract behind the convenient & movable guard gate for maximum protection and easy maintenance, give you double sanitary guarantee.

Adjustable Water Spray: Water-pressure control knob allow you to adjust water pressure to create an experience that blends comfort and ease of use, enjoy a perfect healthy life. Elderly and children can also easily use bidets to get ideal intensity

Easy to Install: Non-electronic bidet with high-grade accessories, compatible with most toilets. Easy installation into your standard 2-piece toilet in minutes without plumbers. Say goodbye to toilet paper and greet a cleaner, healthier lifestyle now!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 COLOR OPTIONS 2 PREMIUM BLACK 3 CLASSIC WHITE 4 BRUSHED NICKEL

Turn on Posterior Mode When you turn on the Posterior Mode, you can adjust the water pressure with the knob according to your personal preference. After that, you don't need to adjust the water pressure every time you use it. Turn on Feminine Mode When you turn on the Feminine Mode, you can adjust the water pressure with the knob according to your personal preference. After that, you don't need to adjust the water pressure every time you use it. Turn on Self-Cleaning The powerful water flow will rinse the stains from the nozzle and maintain long-term hygiene. You can rinse the nozzle first before using the bidet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slicky slim design
reviews.reviewText: This bidet is super slim and yet sturdy. The white and black color provides elegant look. It was easy to install with the washer and pipe tape provided. It has all the features - front and rear wash, adjustable water pressure, shelf cleaning nozzle. Right now (Jan 2024) there is $10 coupon at checkout which makes it the best deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Why Didn't I Buy This Sooner?
reviews.reviewText: I held off on buying one of these for a really long time until my aunt was vacationing in Thailand and a couple other countries where they're standard and gave me some inspo lol. I wasn't sure if I wanted one with temp control, but I saw this one on sale and figured I'd try it out without because the price is great. I am so glad I did! This thing works great and I don't really feel like I need the temp control (even though I live in Idaho and it's freezing in winter lol. It's fine!) Anyway, it was also insanely easy to install. I just watched a YouTube video of someone else doing it and I had it on and working in less than 20 minutes and no leaks or problems and barely having looked at the instructions. I would highly suggest this. I bought two for both bathrooms because the price was so good. Definitely a handy gadget. Makes things more sanitary especially when you have female needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price!
reviews.reviewText: The wife and I were looking for a bidet, but for a budget. Stumbled on this when it went on sale. Instructions were a bit confusing, but still easy to install. Works as intended and cleans the tush really well. The only reason it got 4 stars is because the plastic that supports the controller from the toilet is a bit flimsy. A little concerned with force it might snap and break. Other than that, overall a good purchase.👍🏽

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to attach, love the dual nozzle, GREAT bidet. Buy it.
reviews.reviewText: I bought a bidet for my old apartment more than 5 years ago, then proceeded to buy one for my boyfriend's apt, and one each for my sisters as gifts. When my bf (now husband) and I moved in together 3 years ago we brought the bidets- as once you experience a clean bottom after using the loo, you cannot go back to life without one attached to your toilet.Fast forward to the present: we needed new bidets due to the vigorous beating/cleaning my husband gives them when he scrubs down the bathrooms bi-monthly (he broke one nozzle door clean off and set the other nozzle off-kilter, but I digress). I decided to go for a dual nozzle for the lady bits and after reading reviews and liking the buttons on this bidet as opposed to a dial, ordered a brushed nickel one.I love this bidet. The buttons are easy and wonderful. It's a great-looking bidet. It was easy to hook up. The price is a steal.Naturally, I had to order a second one for our second bathroom. This time I ordered it in black to match the hardware in the room and have absolutely no aesthetic complaints.An hour ago we bought one as a gift for friends who hosted us for the day and night at the beach yesterday. Not only because they were such fantastic hosts, but also because we wanted to gift them with cleaner nether regions and fewer toilet paper runs, too. Okay... the truth is that I owe them. Not only because we were talking up our bidets with a strange exuberance last night (as you do when intoxicated and stumbling upon 'interesting' conversations) but also because I ate all of their ice cream in the middle of the night (too much wine and a bad case of the munchies). So, not only did we have to prove our point about the bidet magic, I needed to send them something cool as an apology of sorts for plundering their freezer as well. I do believe I will be forgiven instantly upon its maiden use.Buy this one. You'll like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, works well, cold water only, hard to install in a tight space
reviews.reviewText: Instructions are too simple, need a bit more detail on where provided plumber's tape is needed, how to be ready to mop up a little water, best direction to aim the t connection and how to adjust, how the round adapters work to match holes in existing toilets and how they snap in (helpful to know you have to do that, since the plastic is thin and I was afraid of breaking it). Otherwise, if you are OK installing shower heads and hoses, this is easy. It works very well, just make sure you are OK with the water temperature from your cold line. I am in my 60s, but I like doing stuff like this.

I recently purchased the Samodra Bidet from Amazon, and I must say it has been a game-changer in terms of personal hygiene. The installation process was surprisingly straightforward, even for someone like me with limited plumbing skills.What truly sets the Samodra Bidet apart is its remarkable performance. The precision of the water spray is customizable, providing a gentle yet effective cleansing experience. The nozzle self-cleaning feature is a fantastic touch, ensuring a hygienic operation every time.After a romantic dinner, I decided to put the Samodra Bidet to the test. The refreshing sensation and thorough cleaning left me feeling exceptionally clean and invigorated. The water temperature control feature is a luxury, adding a touch of comfort to the experience. After a few glasses of White Zinfandel and several bowls of chili, I was feeling particularly adventurous and I decided to try the “female” front nozzle setting. It was incredible! I felt it wash away all my pent-up rage and aggression along with the feces and I was left feeling clean and calm. I have been using it daily now and could not feel better or more in control. I seem to be constantly backing my car into things, and I cry uncontrollably at TV commercials, but I honestly have never felt more in tune with the World.The adjustable pressure and nozzle positions cater to personal preferences, making it suitable for users of all ages. It can also be dialed up to a shocking stream that feels like there is a tiny Fire Fighter in the toilet putting out a five-alarm blaze in my balloon knot. The sleek design and intuitive controls enhance the overall user experience. Moreover, the bidet's energy-efficient mode aligns with modern sustainability values.In conclusion, the Samodra Bidet exceeded my expectations, providing a level of cleanliness and freshness that traditional methods simply cannot match. I highly recommend it to anyone looking to upgrade their bathroom experience with a reliable, efficient, and user-friendly bidet.
Excelente artículo! Muy cómodo y práctico, además de que es fácil de instalar. Esta fabricado con materiales de buena calidad.

Easy to install, comes with everything you need (except a spanner). We installed one in our ensuite and were so impressed we got one for the other loo in the house. By the time I got to installing the second one, it took barely 15 minutes. Works well, but it’s summer now, might be a bit of a cold shock in the winter….

reviews.reviewerName: Jose Ricardo Garcia CamarenaJose Ricardo Garcia Camarena
reviews.reviewText: Funciona perfectamente, cumple con su función

This far exceeded my expectations, I'd thought about buying it for a while but the installation, was it really worth it? Yes, yes it is. I'm surprised by how easy it was to install and I have a small bathroom with an inconveniently located toilet. It does exactly what it says it does and does it well. Yes it is cold water but not that cold, quite refreshing. Great price with further discount coupon. It looks nice too, very unobtrusive. I'd definitely buy it again.
